meta.title: Sensaia | Smart Asset Management Software | Solar and Wind
meta.description: Sensaia is an O&M software solution for PV and WTG assets. Powered by AI, Sensaia enables predictive maintenance and optimization of renewable energy.

hero.text: The AI Sensation for Renewable Energy.

intro-text: Discover Sensaia, the smartest platform for holistic asset management and renewable energy optimization.

features.title: All your renewable assets  need – on one platform
features.sub-title: Sensaia is a digital solution tailored to the needs of solar and wind power plant owners, operators and asset managers. Sensaia helps to turn insights into actions and thus to boost the profitability of renewable energy assets. The independent asset management software is technology agnostic, but specialized in solar and wind.

media.title: Monitoring.
media.content: The data from all your assets flow into Sensaia, where they are stored and analyzed. Ready to be monitored anytime – in a customizable dashboard, with techno-commercial insights.

media.title: Predicting.
media.content: Sensaia's AI allows for precise forecasts about where a system is likely to fail – before it does. Thanks to the experience from using proven algorithms charged with 10+ years of digital deployment expertise in the energy sector.

media.title: Alerting.
media.content: Energy must flow. If it does not, Sensaia is there to alert you. AI determines the upside potential to enable early effective actions, reduce costly downtime and to derive ideal maintenance schedules.

media.title: Ticketing.
media.content: Sensaia gets the job done. Create tickets from alerts, assign and track them in an intuitive Kanban board to make sure everything is up and running.

media.title: Reporting.
media.content: Rely on automated benchmark reports that summarize everything you and your stakeholders need to know.
